text: Welcome to this temple. I am Father Santino.
I'm busy preparing this morning's service.
At 10:00 the service will start. Feel free to join us.
If you got questions about anything, please come see me after the service at 11:00. For one hour, after every service, I am open for answering questions to the congregation.
The service is about to begin. Please join us if you'd like.
[Question about Ulrog?! Come see me tonight at 18:00.]
I'm on my way to the mayor. If you need to see me, come to me at 16:00 after the afternoon service.
I'll be answering questions to the congregation again.
The afternoon service itself starts at 15:00. Feel free to join us.
